channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "P urams!" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:31) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2685 Client type: low memory version UserId: 39300579 Keshas is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2686 Client type: low memory version UserId: 39300579 Keshas is signing onto server. [client-2-Keshas]: Keshas is already online.
I want to login and it shows me but disconnect cmon help me to fix this :/[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 07:20:50 AM[/size][hr]any1 can help?

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

Lol, i just had the error to but i fixed it… if you look in shophandler.java so do you see this

public static int MaxShops = 101; //1 more because we don't use [0] ! that means
there cant be a shop = 101 because they start at 0…so eitherway you increate the numbers or lower the number of the shopyo ujust added if there are any free space left
